I’ll prepare a JSON object to reflect this category and respond with clarity. I want to ensure I’m accurately capturing the user's request!**Preparing JSON output**

Following the schema exactly, I’ll make sure to format it properly without any extra text. The final output will be: {"category":"Purchase"}. I want to be precise!
